options.name: #60esta_complementaria#61#34#34_de#61#34#34_es#61#34#34_ficha#61#
options.displayName: Clusters of cases (groups of two or more cases) have been identified, either in time or space. The frequency of the event is considered higher than expected. It is a new or previously undescribed event, or it is a known event with new or unexpected clinical or epidemiological characteristics (in terms of population groups, geographic areas, etc.). Some data indicate that the event was caused by a programmatic error or a deviation in the quality of the vaccine, its diluent (if applicable), or the device used for its administration. This form serves as a guide to identify all information considered relevant for the causality analysis of the event. Such analysis should be carried out by a committee of experts in ESAVI at the subnational or national level, and factors contributing to its occurrence must be identified in order to establish risk mitigation measures.
options.displayFormName: Clusters of cases (groups of two or more cases) have been identified, either in time or space. The frequency of the event is considered higher than expected. It is a new or previously undescribed event, or it is a known event with new or unexpected clinical or epidemiological characteristics (in terms of population groups, geographic areas, etc.). Some data indicate that the event was caused by a programmatic error or a deviation in the quality of the vaccine, its diluent (if applicable), or the device used for its administration. This form serves as a guide to identify all information considered relevant for the causality analysis of the event. Such analysis should be carried out by a committee of experts in ESAVI at the subnational or national level, and factors contributing to its occurrence must be identified in order to establish risk mitigation measures.

translations.value: Clusters van gevallen (groepen van twee of meer gevallen) zijn geïdentificeerd,  hetzij in tijd of ruimte. De frequentie van de gebeurtenis wordt als hoger beschouwd dan verwacht. Het is een nieuwe of eerder onbeschreven gebeurtenis,  of het is een bekende gebeurtenis met nieuwe of onverwachte klinische of epidemiologische kenmerken (in termen van bevolkingsgroepen,  geografische gebieden,  enz.). Sommige gegevens wijzen erop dat de gebeurtenis werd veroorzaakt door een programmeerfout of door een afwijking in de kwaliteit van het vaccin,  het verdunningsmiddel (indien van toepassing) of het apparaat dat voor de toediening werd gebruikt. Dit blad dient als leidraad om alle informatie te identificeren die relevant wordt geacht voor de causaliteitsanalyse van de gebeurtenis. Deze analyse moet worden uitgevoerd door een commissie van ESAVI-experts op subnationaal of nationaal niveau en de factoren die hebben bijgedragen aan het ontstaan ??ervan moeten worden geïdentificeerd om risicobeperkende maatregelen te kunnen vaststellen.

Esta ficha es complementaria de la ficha de notificación y se debe cumplimentar considerando los datos de la primera. Solo se debe rellenar en casos en que el nivel técnico subnacional haya decidido llevar a cabo una investigación completa por tratarse de un evento grave o de un evento no grave que cumpla algunas de las siguientes condiciones:
1. Se han identificado conglomerados de casos (grupos de dos o más casos), ya sea en el tiempo o en el espacio.
2. La frecuencia del evento se considera superior a lo esperado.
3. Es un evento nuevo o no descrito antes, o es un evento conocido con características clínicas o epidemiológicas nuevas o no esperadas (en términos de grupos poblacionales, zonas geográficas, etc.).
4. Algunos datos indican que el evento fue ocasionado por un error programático o por una desviación de la calidad de la vacuna, su diluyente (si aplica) o el dispositivo empleado para su administración.
Esta ficha sirve de guía para identificar toda la información que se considere relevante para el análisis de causalidad del evento. Dicho análisis debe ser realizado por un comité de expertos en ESAVI a nivel subnacional o nacional y se deben identificar los factores que contribuyeron a su aparición a fin de poder establecer medidas de mitigación del riesgo.

Clusters of cases (groups of two or more cases) have been identified, either in time or space. The frequency of the event is considered higher than expected. It is a new or previously undescribed event, or it is a known event with new or unexpected clinical or epidemiological characteristics (in terms of population groups, geographic areas, etc.). Some data indicate that the event was caused by a programmatic error or a deviation in the quality of the vaccine, its diluent (if applicable), or the device used for its administration. This form serves as a guide to identify all information considered relevant for the causality analysis of the event. Such analysis should be carried out by a committee of experts in ESAVI at the subnational or national level, and factors contributing to its occurrence must be identified in order to establish risk mitigation measures.

options.name: a_partir_de_su_investigación#44_¿considera_que_hubo_un_error_en_l
options.displayName: Do you consider that there was an error in the preparation or reconstitution (wrong product, vaccine or diluent, mixing, syringe, or improper filling of the syringe, etc.) of the vaccine by the vaccinator?
options.displayFormName: Do you consider that there was an error in the preparation or reconstitution (wrong product, vaccine or diluent, mixing, syringe, or improper filling of the syringe, etc.) of the vaccine by the vaccinator?

translations.value: ¿Considera que hubo un error en la preparación o reconstitución (producto, vacuna o diluyente equivocado, mezcla, jeringa o llenado inapropiado de la jeringa, etc.) de la vacuna por el vacunador?

Do you consider that there was an error in the preparation or reconstitution (wrong product, vaccine or diluent, mixing, syringe, or improper filling of the syringe, etc.) of the vaccine by the vaccinator?

Vindt u dat er een fout was in de voorbereiding of reconstructie (verkeerd product, vaccin of verdunningsmiddel, menging, spuit of onjuiste vulling van de spuit, enz.) van het vaccin door de vaccinator?

options.name: a_partir_de_su_investigación#44_¿considera_que_las_condiciones_fí
options.displayName: Do you consider that the physical conditions of the vaccine (color, turbidity, foreign substances, etc.) were abnormal at the time of administration?
options.displayFormName: Do you consider that the physical conditions of the vaccine (color, turbidity, foreign substances, etc.) were abnormal at the time of administration?

translations.value: Do you consider that the physical conditions of the vaccine (color, turbidity, foreign substances, etc.) were abnormal at the time of administration?
Dat de fysieke omstandigheden van het vaccin (kleur, troebelheid, vreemde stoffen, enz.) abnormaal waren op het moment van toediening?
¿Considera que las condiciones físicas de la vacuna (color, turbidez, sustancias extrañas, etc.) eran anormales en el momento de la administración?

options.name: a_partir_de_su_investigación#44_¿considera_que_la_vacuna_administ
options.displayName: Do you think that the managed vaccine could have been contaminated?
options.displayFormName: Do you think that the managed vaccine could have been contaminated?

translations.value: ¿Considera que la vacuna administrada pudo haber estado contaminada?
Dat het toegediende vaccin besmet kan zijn?
Do you think that the managed vaccine could have been contaminated?

options.name: a_partir_de_su_investigación#44_¿considera_que_la_vacuna_se_admin
options.displayName: Do you think the vaccine was administered incorrectly (wrong dose, administration site or route, needle of the wrong size, not follow -up to good injection practices, etc.)?
options.displayFormName: Do you think the vaccine was administered incorrectly (wrong dose, administration site or route, needle of the wrong size, not follow -up to good injection practices, etc.)?

translations.value: Do you think the vaccine was administered incorrectly (wrong dose, administration site or route, needle of the wrong size, not follow -up to good injection practices, etc.)?
Dat het vaccin onjuist is toegediend (verkeerde dosis, plaats of toedieningsweg, verkeerde maat naald, niet volgen van goede injectiepraktijken, enz.)?
¿Considera que la vacuna se administró incorrectamente (dosis equivocada, sitio o ruta de administración, aguja del tamaño equivocado, no seguimiento a buenas prácticas de inyección, etc.)?

options.name: a_partir_de_su_investigación#66_¿considera_que_hubo_un_error_en_l
options.displayName: Do you consider that there was an error in the handling of the vaccine (interruption of the cold chain during transport, storage or vaccination day, etc.)?
options.displayFormName: Do you consider that there was an error in the handling of the vaccine (interruption of the cold chain during transport, storage or vaccination day, etc.)?

translations.value: ¿Considera que hubo un error en la manipulación de la vacuna (interrupción de la cadena de frio durante el transporte, el almacenamiento o la jornada de vacunación, etc.)?
Do you consider that there was an error in the handling of the vaccine (interruption of the cold chain during transport, storage or vaccination day, etc.)?
Dat er een fout is gemaakt bij de behandeling van het vaccin (onderbreking van de koudeketen tijdens transport, opslag of vaccinatiedag, enz.)?
